item.title: Synapse sql pools credentials
item.description: Create credentials to query datalake container through SQL Pools create credential [https://DATALAKE_ACCOUNT_NAME.dfs.core.windows.net/CONTAINER] with identity='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', secret = '?sv=2020-08-04&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupx&se=2022-12-21T21:35:50Z&st=2021-12-21T13:35:50Z&spr=https&sig=************************************'
